## RenderQueue.getInstanceInfo() method

Gets the instance information for given drawable object

**Signature:**

```typescript
getInstanceInfo(drawable: Drawable): DrawableInstanceInfo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  drawable | [Drawable](doc/markdown/./scene.drawable.md) | The drawable object |

**Returns:**

DrawableInstanceInfo

The instane information for given drawable object, null if no exists
